subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Buddy Marucci and George Zahringer advanced to the final of the Senior Amateur Championship, winning quarterfinal and semifinal matches at Shady Oaks Country Club in Fort Worth. Marucci eliminated John Grace, a 17-time Shady Oaks club champion, 3 and 2, in the morning quarterfinals, then beat Frank Ford III of Charleston, S.C., 2-up in the afternoon semifinals. Zahringer, 55, a New Yorker who won the 2002 United States Mid-Amateur, edged Randy Nichols of Connersville, Ind., 1-up in the semifinals with a par on No. 18.
